name: Sandbox Project - Combat Demo
description:
Don't expect much please! The main reason i decided to upload here was to get some friends to easily test. It's very far from even a prototype.
WASD to move.
ctrl + WASD to change character direction. Some spells will cast in front of player so it might be important!
1-4 to cast spell if not on cooldown. F to cast healing spell
Left click to melee attack if not on cooldown.
Right click to select target
